#BlackMagicCraft #Episode221

A huge thank you to The Dragon Trapper's Lodge for sponsoring this episode!

Check out The DRAGON TRAPPER'S LODGE
http://bit.ly/dragon-trappers-patreon

They also have previous models available for individual purchase at: 
http://bit.ly/Dragon-trappers-store

Modular docks are a great bit of terrain for tabletop RPGs, and if you make them generic enough they can double as bridges or general platforms. Good for the coastline, good for the mines! And you can make them out of whatever you have available.

title: MODULAR DOCKS - Made w/ Wood, Foam, or Paper?
